meanings.definition: Every one of a group or series; each.
meanings.sent1: Everwhich student must complete the assignment.
meanings.sent2: I will give you everwhich book you choose.
meanings.sent3: The teacher asked everwhich student to stand on one leg.
meanings.sent4: In the library, everwhich book is a treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: Everwhich flower in the garden bloomed beautifully.

meanings.definition: Any one of a group or series; whichever.
meanings.sent1: You can pick everwhich color you like for your room.
meanings.sent2: Everwhich cupcake you choose will be delicious.
meanings.sent3: I wonder which everwhich cupcake will win the taste test.
meanings.sent4: She can choose everwhich path she wants to take in life.
meanings.sent5: Everwhich flavor of ice cream is your favorite?

meanings.definition: In any manner or way; at all.
meanings.sent1: I can't everwhich understand his handwriting.
meanings.sent2: She danced everwhich gracefully at the recital.
meanings.sent3: He tried to fix the broken toy everwhich way.
meanings.sent4: The magician made the rabbit disappear everwhich.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted everwhich with vibrant colors.
